relation: I have had problems with an ex boyfriend and they were always keeping a close eye on me ensuring I was safe. I definitely felt safe and secure on campus. All of security is AWESOME!
The students love to hang with each other and the mall is right down the road. It definitely is always a fun campus!
The college is surrounded by a great variety of fast food and restaurant choices. It's awesome and all walking distance!
The teachers are all very interactive and fun. All my teachers this semester have kept the class exciting and alive.
Make sure you register ON TIME because they don't except late registration anymore.
The school is so diverse and everyone is nice. I immediately felt comfortable on campus with fellow student and my teachers. It's a great small school that I would recommend.
pageTitle: South Mountain Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4048=there are not many unusual traditions but we do tend to hold similar events every years around the same time. for example the spring fling in april and the men's luncheon in november., 18331=Very professional and Organized,i respect their structure because it allow's student's from all walk's of life to be successful. #2.I was blessed to attend in the spring of 2013 and i excelled behind their excellent instructor's and excellent program's to assist you every step of the way. #3.I look forward to obtaining my associates degree and graduation,all of my decision's are professional which connect's to their foundation and what this successful college was built on,and i'm only a freshman so it's very visible and appreciated., 93778=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students south mountain is great for all types of students! Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus there are not many unusual traditions but we do tend to hold similar events every years around the same time. for example the spring fling in april and the men's luncheon in november. Bang for the buck you will definitely meet a lot of genuinely amazing people at south. being a small campus is in our favor and has brought students and employees together as a family. What to do for fun south mountain has quite the verity of clubs and activities on campus. many students get active in clubs on campus to spend their free time with friends planning events and projects. Food and Dining the cafeteria at south is very delicious. the cooks are the same ones every time you go in and they know everyone's order and what they might like. if you want something special they will definitely fix you up whatever you like. Dorm Life there are no dorms on campus. most students who attend south mountain community
